name: ncf-grant-demo
description: Full-stack GraphQL Ministry Grant Management Demo showcasing Apollo Server, React, Prisma, and PostgreSQL
author: Tom Hundley <tom@thomashundley.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:server && npm run typecheck:client
scripts.vercel-build: prisma generate --schema=./server/prisma/schema.prisma && cd client && npm run build
